jsCow.res.components.group.name: jsCow.res.components.group
jsCow.res.components.group.description:
jsCow group component is a reusable component used in client side jsCow applications. 
A group is a component, which enables users to group any components.
jsCow.res.components.group.author: Mario Linz <jscow@gmx.de>
jsCow.res.components.group.type: Class Provides the main class of the component

jsCow.res.model.group.name: jsCow.res.model.group
jsCow.res.model.group.description: Represents the model class of the jsCow group component.
jsCow.res.model.group.author: Mario Linz <jscow@gmx.de>
jsCow.res.model.group.type: Class Provides the model class of the component

jsCow.res.view.group.name: jsCow.res.view.group
jsCow.res.view.group.description: Represents the view class of the jsCow group component.
jsCow.res.view.group.author: Mario Linz <jscow@gmx.de>
jsCow.res.view.group.type: Class Provides the view class of the component

jsCow.res.controller.group.name: jsCow.res.controller.group
jsCow.res.controller.group.description: Represents the controller class of the jsCow group component.
jsCow.res.controller.group.author: Mario Linz <jscow@gmx.de>
jsCow.res.controller.group.type: Class Provides the controller class of the component

classitems.name: init

classitems.description:
The model init method will only trigger the internal component event 'model.ready'.
The event data are the model data.
Default listener for this event is registered in the controller of the component. 
	  	
	  	this.trigger("model.ready", this.data);
classitems.name: init

classitems.description: Objekt for all needed HTML-DOM elements of the component.
classitems.name: dom

classitems.description: Represents the html main container of the component.
classitems.name: dom.main

classitems.description: Represents the inner html container of the component.
classitems.name: dom.content

classitems.description:
The view init method can used to set default view properties.
By trigger the event 'model.ready' the controller will trigger the event 'view.init' to call this method.
classitems.name: init Set all default view properties and trigger the component event 'view.update'.

classitems.description: The view update method will update the complete component view by trigger the event 'view.update' with all available model data.
classitems.name: update
init
isModelReady
